about_the_game:
AEW: Fight Forever Rated Gold Superstar Pack features the legendary Adam Copeland along with the all new Fright Forever Haunted Forest map AND 30 additional skins. All of this PLUS seven new moves including finishers and taunts.

This content is part of Season Pass 4 which features:
  • Samoa Joe
  • Adam Copeland
  • Jay White
  • Japan Shrine Map
  • Fright Forever Haunted Forest Map
  • New Tournament Mode
  • 52 Attire and Skin Options
  • 10 new music tracks
  • 30 new moves

content_descriptors.notes: Blood could be visible in barbed wire matches and if using certain weapons. You can turn off blood effects at anytime in the options menu!

About the Game

AEW: Fight Forever Rated Gold Superstar Pack features the legendary Adam Copeland along with the all new Fright Forever Haunted Forest map AND 30 additional skins. All of this PLUS seven new moves including finishers and taunts.
